project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Create a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the application will interface with the user through the terminal.

task.name: Implement feature to search for contacts
Implement feature to update existing contacts
Handle JSON file operations (loading and saving contacts)
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
